title: == sync, corrected by elderman == @elder_man Crip predicts a COVID epidemic in the 2013 song?
subtitle: In his 2013 song "The Pandemic," the rapper was singing about the Corona virus.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Mr. A.A.M.M.M., Mr. A.M.P.D., Mr. A.D.D., Mr. A.D.D., Mr. D.D.D., Mr. D.D.D., Mr. D.D.D., Mr. D.D.D.D., Mr. D.D.D.D., Mr. D.D.P.D., Mr. D.D.P.D.D., Mr. D.D.D.D., Mr. D.D.D.D., Mr. D.D.D.D., Mr. D.D.D.D., Mr. M.D.D., Mr. M.D.D.D., Mr. M.D.D. Crip, a rapper, predicted the 2020 Krona virus epidemic in his 2013 song entitled "A plague," singing: "2020 plus the Corona virus, body accumulation."
